title: Ticket #5862: BOINC backfill broken unless ENCRYPT_EXECUTE_DIRECTORY is true
description:
CAE reported that BOINC backfill was crashing after the upgraded from 8.2.x to 8.4.5 They sent a Win10 core file. 

//=====================================================
PID: 6076
Exception code: C0000005 ACCESS_VIOLATION
Fault address:  0022737B 01:0005637B C:\condor\bin\condor_startd.exe

Registers:
EAX:00000000
EBX:01C730B0
ECX:8003003F
EDX:00000000
ESI:00000000
EDI:00C97EB0
CS:EIP:0023:0022737B
SS:ESP:002B:007BEFA0  EBP:007BF314
DS:002B  ES:002B  FS:0053  GS:002B
Flags:00010246

Call stack:
Address   Frame
0022737B  007BF314  Starter::execDCStarter (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\starter.cpp:925)
00227216  007BF35C  Starter::execBOINCStarter (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\starter.cpp:776)
002296FE  007BF368  Starter::spawn (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\starter.cpp:599)
001DB84D  007BF404  BOINC_BackfillMgr::spawnClient (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\boinc_mgr.cpp:338)
001DBAC6  007BF430  BOINC_BackfillMgr::start (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\boinc_mgr.cpp:276)
00218FB5  007BF438  Resource::start_backfill (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\resource.cpp:2054)
0021B0E1  007BF44C  ResState::eval (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\resstate.cpp:536)
0020CFAB  007BF470  ResMgr::walk (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\resmgr.cpp:692)
00208CCB  007BF47C  ResMgr::eval_all (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_startd.v6\resmgr.cpp:1125)
002F591D  007BF4AC  TimerManager::Timeout (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_daemon_core.v6\timer_manager.cpp:438)
002561F2  007BF9E8  DaemonCore::Driver (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_daemon_core.v6\daemon_core.cpp:3440)
002678D2  007BFA84  dc_main (c:\condor\execute\dir_7188\userdir\src\condor_daemon_core.v6\daemon_core_main.cpp:2780)
00374E00  007BFAC4  __tmainCRTStartup (f:\dd\vctools\crt_bld\self_x86\crt\src\crtexe.c:536)
754762C4  007BFAD8  BaseThreadInitThunk+24
77530609  007BFB20  RtlSubscribeWnfStateChangeNotification+439
775305D4  007BFB30  RtlSubscribeWnfStateChangeNotification+404

//=====================================================

The problem appears to be that when running a BOINC backfill job, there is no claim, so an attempt to lookup ENCRYPT_EXECUTE_DIRECTORY in the claim ad is crashing.
